mapper.insert: insert into recordbooks_value(bookno,userno,bookcolumnno) select (select bookno from recordbooks where booknm=#{bookNm}) as bookno, "userNo" as userno, #{columnNo} as bookcolumnno from member where activityYN='Y'
mapper.select: select * from recordbooks_value order by split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',1)::numeric asc,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',2)::numeric asc ,split_part(bookcolumnno,'-',3)::numeric asc,userno asc
